1.0.name: wordpress/wow-tcgbrowser-card-tooltips
1.0.description: The plugin adds a button in the visual post editor. To use it, just select the text that represents a WoW TCG card name, and click the button. It will turn the text into a link to the card's page on http://wow.tcgbrowser.com. Note that the tooltips will work only after you publish or preview the post.
